t: Rise and shine with the seven best sunrise alarm clocks, tried and tested | Sleep | The Guardian
s: January 29, 2025 - Some brands did not want the sunrise alarm clocks I sourced for testing back, so those will be donated for fundraising to Cat Action Trust 1977, a small national charity dedicated to the welfare of feral cats. ... Each sunrise alarm clock, including the Beurer Wake-up Light WL50 (pictured), was tested over at least two nights. Photograph: Pete Wise · The only proper way to test a sunrise alarm clock is by using it to wake up each morning ...
